backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata linking features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries of key frontend files for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and dark mode theme variables for industrial color scheme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with favicon, viewport settings, title, and root mount for React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering full site layout with navigation, hero, products, advantages, contact, and footer.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Display-only contact form that collects input and shows a demo alert on submit.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Reusable product card displaying an image, name, description, and link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider offering login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS theme with industrial colors, dark mode variants, and utility extensions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for a themed responsive UI.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, including schema version, high-level summary, and a list of implemented features for the static home page.
